entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
